.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImageDecoder extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.Lang.IAutoCloseable, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: A class for converting encoded images (like PNG, JPEG, WEBP, GIF, or HEIF) into Drawable or Bitmap objects.
